::Havoc/Repressor::

Havoc stops at the entrance to Training Room 1, looking around and 
seeing the other two Warmachine's following him.

"As soon as Chaos and Minion get here, we can start."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Demolition::
> 
> He got out of his CR, when the other War Machines did. He followed 
them
> as they walked to the training room.
